Direct-TO | Special Announcement
North Atlantic Operations Update
New “SET MAX UPLINK DELAY VALUE” procedures in the North Atlantic and the CPDLC Uplink Message Latency Monitor Function
CLICK HERE FOR MORE INFORMATION <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/News/Current/Copy%20of%20NATLANTICOPUPDATEMay5]]>
